The '''Naruto Region Combo''' is a taijutsu attack used by [[Naruto Uzumaki]] in his [[Six Paths Sage Mode]], [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]] and while using the [[Six Paths Senjutsu]] and is the strongest taijutsu in his arsenal. After using his Multiple Shadow Clone Technique, Naruto creates an army of clones to assault his opponent, overwhelming them by attacking on all sides while yelling "U-ZU-MA-KI". The rest of the clones then follow up with a direct attack to finish the combo.
